WELCOME.MESSAGE.LINE1: Welcome to the Transversal digital signature area.
WELCOME.MESSAGE.LINE2: To start signing please expand the menu on the left and select Sign.

SIGN.SET_EXSYST_FILE_PANEL.TITLE: 3. Extra system signature (on your PC)
SIGN.SET_EXSYST_FILE_PANEL.MSG_ALERT:
Attention! Remember that: 
- in the case of signature Holographic in the pdf the identity document must be included 
- in the case of signature of multiple documents: 
- all documents must be signed with the same type of signature 
- it is necessary to check correspondence between the 'original document' and the 'uploaded document'
SIGN.SET_EXSYST_FILE_PANEL.TABLE.ERROR.U: Error loading file: The uploaded file is in an invalid format
SIGN.SET_EXSYST_FILE_PANEL.TABLE.WARNING: Warning! By selecting a different type, the uploaded files will be deleted
